title: Preserving, Reading, or Studying Everyday Writing

content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develop a position on the value, if any, of preserving, reading, or studying everyday writing.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develop a position on the value, if any, of preserving, reading, or studying everyday writing.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
